hero.title: Supporting Diverse Communities Across NSW
hero.description:
Empowering multicultural communities through settlement support, home care, family services, and community engagement programs tailored to your needs.

Not sure where to start?
We will guide you through the next steps.

serviceCards.sectionDescription: Over four decades of realimpact, built through long-term community partnerships across New South Wales.

settlement.title: Settlement Support
settlement.description: New to Australia? We guide you through housing, employment, and next steps to help you feel at home with confidence.

agedCare.title: Aged Care
agedCare.description: Need care that honours your independence and respects your culture? We support seniors from multicultural backgrounds and their families at home and in the community.

familySupport.title: Family Support
familySupport.description: Looking for parenting help? We offer confidential family counselling and community playgroups to help you and your children thrive.

communityEngagement.title: Community Engagement
communityEngagement.description: Struggling to cope with life in Australia? We support children’s learning and help families connect with community support.

footer.description: Supporting multicultural communities across NSW with culturally appropriate services and programs. Mosaic Multicultural Connections provides settlement support, home care, family services, language and translation, and community engagement. Our multilingual team partners with communities to improve access, inclusion, and wellbeing.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Mosaic Multicultural Connections. All rights reserved.

newsletter.title: Stay up to date
newsletter.description: Get updates on our programs and community events

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Join us in supporting multicultural communities across NSW. There are many ways to make a meaningful difference.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our multilingual team. We're here to help you access the support and services you need.

form.title: Send Us a Message

placeholders.message: Please describe how we can help you...

form.note: * Required fields. We'll respond within 24 hours during business days.

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours during business days.
success.urgentNote: For urgent matters during business hours, please call us directly at 1800 813 205.
